options: static
relative
absolute
inherit
questions.title: Which of the following is not a valid value of position property?

options: The element will be positioned relative to its normal position
The element will be positioned relative to the first positioned ancestor
The element will be positioned relative to the viewport
The element will be positioned relative to the nearest ancestor with a position other than static
questions.title: If an element's position is set to relative, what does it mean?

options: auto
inherit
questions.title: What is the default value of z-index property?

options: auto
inherit
questions.title: Which of the following is not a valid value of z-index property?

options: The element will be positioned behind all other elements
The element will be positioned in front of all other elements
The element will be positioned in front of all other elements with a z-index of 0 or lower
The element will be positioned behind all other elements with a z-index of 0 or higher
questions.title: If an element's z-index is set to a negative value, what will happen?

options: The element will be positioned relative to its normal position
The element will be positioned relative to the first positioned ancestor
The element will be positioned relative to the viewport
The element will be positioned relative to the nearest ancestor with a position other than static
questions.title: If an element's position is set to absolute, what does it mean?

options: The element will be positioned in front of all other elements
The element will be positioned behind all other elements
The element will be positioned in front of all other elements with a z-index of 0 or lower
The element will be positioned behind all other elements with a z-index of 0 or higher
questions.title: What is the stacking order of elements with a z-index of 1?

options: The element will be positioned in front of all other elements
The element will be positioned behind all other elements
The element will be positioned in front of all other elements with a z-index of 0 or lower
The element will be positioned behind all other elements with a z-index of 0 or higher
questions.title: What is the stacking order of elements with a z-index of -1?

options: The element will be positioned relative to its normal position
The element will be positioned relative to the first positioned ancestor
The element will be positioned relative to the viewport
The element will be positioned relative to the nearest ancestor with a position other than static
questions.title: If an element's position is set to fixed, what does it mean?

options: in front of
behind
at same level
below
questions.title: An element with a z-index of 1 is positioned ______ an element with a z-index of 0

answers.2: The element will be positioned relative to its normal position
answers.5: The element will be positioned behind all other elements
answers.6: The element will be positioned relative to the first positioned ancestor
answers.7: The element will be positioned in front of all other elements
answers.8: The element will be positioned behind all other elements with a z-index of 0 or higher
answers.9: The element will be positioned relative to the viewport
